"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me.

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created.

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created.

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created.

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created.

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked. 
"We need you to lead us.
" t

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said.

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to build

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to build aroun

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me.

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct all

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't hae

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the be

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was frozen in pl

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out th

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me.

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out the window and briefly

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee.

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out the window and briefly saw my mom outside, still crying. The wind

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out the window and briefly saw my mom outside, still crying. The window was then covered a

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me.

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out the window and briefly saw my mom outside, still crying. The window was then covered as well, leaving me co

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out the window and briefly saw my mom outside, still crying. The window was then covered as well, leaving me completely alone. t

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said.

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out the window and briefly saw my mom outside, still crying. The window was then covered as well, leaving me completely alone. The

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created. 

I sit down in a chair and look around, unable to believe what is happening. The bee then comes up to me and whispers into my ear. "Your Majesty, we have been waiting for you for so long."

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out the window and briefly saw my mom outside, still crying. The window was then covered as well, leaving me completely alone. as the King

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee king there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me. 

With my mother in tears, I follow the bee. He leads me to the hive, where I see thousands of bees working together to create a beautiful home. It's a home bigger than my own! I step inside and see there is even furniture that they had created.

"Why have you been waiting for me? What can I do to help you?" I asked."We need you to lead us.
" the bee said. 

I felt a sense of pride. That quickly turned to fear though as I watched the bees begin to cover the front door. They then begin to construct restraints, holding me in place. 

"We can't have you leaving us ever again" said the bee. 

I was now stuck forever in this chair. I looked out the window and briefly saw my mom outside, still crying. The window was then covered as well, leaving me completely alone. as the King of the bees.

Your entire life, you've been told you're deathly allergic to bees. You've always had people protecting you from them, be it your mother or a hired hand. Today, one slips through and lands on your shoulder. You hear a tiny voice say "Your Majesty, what are your orders?"

I'm shocked and don't know what to do. Did the bee really just talk? I asked the bee why it called me that. 

"Sir, you are the king of the bees. We've been trying to contact you since you were a child"

I can't believe what I've heard. I'm a King. A king of the bees! I'm going to be the best bee King there ever was! Just then, my mother approaches and see what is happening. She immediately lunges toward the bee in an attempt to kill it. 

I stop her and confront her about what is happening. She tells me that I'm not a bee, I'm a human. I look between her and the bee, trying to understand who I should trust. The bee then asks me to follow him and he'll prove my destiny to me.
